roleset.name: equal, without variation

role.descr: second equal thing, even in comparison to what

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on SHARP.

example.name: al args
example.text: Zeno the Epicurean, who has been mentioned before. k Timocrates, according to Diogenes Laertius, was even with him in his abuses.
example.arg: Zeno the Epicurean, who has been mentioned before. k Timocrates, according to Diogenes Laertius
